articles.title: India on track to become 4th nation on the Moon as Russia delays lunar mission - Republic World
articles.description: Russia's Luna 25 mission will now be launched to the Moon in August atop the Soyuz-2.1b carrier rocket from the Vostochny space center.
articles.content: India has the opportunity to beat Russia to the Moon as the latter has decided to postpone the launch of its first lunar mission until August of this year. Russia's Luna 25 was scheduled to launch on… [+2886 chars]
